doctor_utters: [ask] How may I help you today?
[ask] Do you have shortness of breath?
[ask] Do you have chest pain or tightness?
[ask] Have you been coughing up any sputum or mucus?
[ask] Have you been exposed to any environmental irritants such as smoke, dust, or pollen?
[ask] Have you been experiencing any other symptoms such as fatigue, wheezing, or difficulty sleeping?
[ask] Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
[ask] Have you been taking any medications?
[inform] Based on your description, the most likely diagnosis is Bronchospasm / acute asthma exacerbation.
patient_utters: Yes, I am experiencing shortness of breath or difficulty breathing in a significant way.
Yes, I live in a big city and am exposed to secondhand cigarette smoke on a daily basis. I am also more likely to develop common allergies than the general population.
Yes, I have been experiencing fatigue and wheezing.
Yes, I have been taking a bronchodilator for my asthma.
